amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds by DOD to partner with private organizations to create or expand national heritage asset areas in southeast Colorado.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in House Report 114-623 to prevent DOD from partnering with private organizations to create or expand national heritage asset areas in southeast Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Buck.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Buck amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
